Dialog.text: Kruse! This is Vijay. Listen to me. You need to stay off the lunar surface. I repeat - do not step foot on the regolith. There's... something underneath. I think it's drawn to movement. It senses vibrations. I can't kill it.
There's a shuttle in Crew, but we're stuck in the damn crater until we can get the Typhon Gates down.
Round up anyone else you can find. Warn them. I-
Dialog.notes: SFX - sound of moonshark, then cut off.

Dialog.text: Thank you. This is Officer Bhatia with a quick lost and found update.
This is Officer Bhatia, head of security. Just want to take a second to call out this month's security commendation.
The commendation goes to officer... Casey Fletcher for outstanding service. Be sure to congratulate Officer Fletcher and buy her a round.
You wanted to see me?
Yes, sir. That's right.
I am.
I'm sure he'd be honored. [throat clear] Was there something you needed?
This is... it's a surveillance device.
It's one of ours. Did you get this from security?
Dialog.notes: some creeping dread mixed w/ confusion

Dialog.text: Sir. I've never given an order to-
Dialog.notes: Shocked... vijay sees himself as honorable and above reproach

Dialog.text: I trust my people. I can't imagine any of them doing this.
I'll get to the bottom of this, Mr. Yu. You have my word.
What did you find?
Anything else?
And no recent requisition entries?
So we have no idea how long they've been missing, and whoever took them probably hacked their way in.
[Big sigh] Alright. Keep it to yourself for the next cycle. I don't want to show our hand just yet.
Dialog.notes: Last thing I want to do.

Dialog.text: Thanks, Casey.
I will. Thank you.
Dialog.notes: Voice has gone dead, distant. What's this letter.

Dialog.text: An important briefcase has been misplaced on Level Two, near the lounge of the Crew Annex. If you locate it, please contact security immediately.
